title: 216: Plato's Crito
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: We finish out the saga of Socrates's trial and death. In this one, Socrates defends why he's sticking around to guzzle some hemlock.
itunes:author: Three champions of the city
itunes:subtitle: Credo?
